desc.p: Transaction reference of the outstanding settlement.

Multi-valued field associated with the SEC.POS.KEY, UNSETT.NOM.CR, UNSETT.AMT.CR, UNSETT.AMT.DR and SEC.TRANS.ID fields. This field will contain the unsettled nominal in the security position it is associated with.

Multi-valued field associated with the SEC.POS.KEY, UNSETT.AMT.CR, UNSETT.NOM.DR, UNSETT.AMT.DR and SEC.TRANS.ID fields. This field will contain the unsettled nominal in the security position it is associated with.
Value date of the outstanding settlement.

Multi-valued field associated with the SEC.POS.KEY, UNSETT.NOM.CR, UNSETT.NOM.DR, UNSETT.AMT.DR and SEC.TRANS.ID fields. This field will contain the unsettled cash in the security position it is associated with.

Multi-valued field associated with the SEC.POS.KEY, UNSETT.NOM.CR, UNSETT.AMT.CR, UNSETT.NOM.DR, and SEC.TRANS.ID fields. This field will contain the unsettled cash in the security position it is associated with.

Multi-valued field associated with the UNSETT.NOM.CR, UNSETT.AMT.CR, UNSETT.NOM.DR, UNSETT.AMT.DR and SEC.TRANS.ID fields. This field will comtain the ID of all the SECURITY.POSITION records that have been updated by this SC.SETTLEMENT and remain unsettled.
ID of the SECURITY.TRANS record that updated the SECURITY.POSITION record from the transaction.
Indicates whether settlement is complete or not.
